CheckBox.name: chk_use_dual_screen
CheckBox.text: Use dual screen mode

CheckBox.name: chk_full_screen_start_join_meeting
CheckBox.text: Enter full screen automatically when starting or joining a meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_full_screen_when_sharing
CheckBox.text: Enter full screen automatically when viewing screen shared by others

CheckBox.name: chk_fit_window_when_sharing
CheckBox.text: Scale to fit my Zoom window when viewing screen shared by others

CheckBox.name: chk_use_aero_mode
CheckBox.text: Use aero mode when sharing the screen

CheckBox.name: chk_use_split_screen_mode
CheckBox.text: Use the split screen mode, which enables the attendees to view the lectures or the gallery

CheckBox.name: chk_use_display_reminder_window_when_exit
CheckBox.text: Use display reminder window when exit

CheckBox.name: chk_show_my_meeting_elapse_time
CheckBox.text: Show my meeting elapse time

CheckBox.name: chk_accelerate_GPU_when_share
CheckBox.text: Accelerate GPU when share
CheckBox.tooltip: Disable this option when other attendees or webinars find that the screen content you share is displaying incorrectly

CheckBox.name: chk_enable_romote_controll_all_applications
CheckBox.text: Enable remote control all applications

Button.name: btn_test_speaker
Button.tooltip: Click on the test speaker to make sure you can hear others

Combo.name: combo_test_speaker
Combo.tooltip: If you cannot hear the test sound, please change the speaker

Button.name: btn_test_mic
Button.tooltip: Click on the test Mic to make sure the other people can hear you

Combo.name: combo_test_mic
Combo.tooltip: If you cannot hear your sound, please change the Mic

CheckBox.name: chk_auto_adjust_mic
CheckBox.text: Automatically adjust volume

CheckBox.name: chk_auto_join_audio
CheckBox.text: Automatically join audio by computer when joining a meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_stereo_audio
CheckBox.text: Enable microphone stereo (when device supports)

CheckBox.name: chk_mic_original_input
CheckBox.text: Enable the original input of mic
CheckBox.tooltip: Sound enhancement effects such as echo cancellation and noise reduction will be turned off

CheckBox.name: chk_echo_cancellation
CheckBox.text: Enable to cancel echo

CheckBox.name: chk_hold_Space_key_to_speak
CheckBox.text: Enable to press and hold the Space key to speak

CheckBox.name: chk_mute_mic_when_join_voip
CheckBox.text: Enable to mute always the microphone when joining meeting by Voip

CheckBox.name: chk_suppress_audio_notify
CheckBox.text: Enable to prompt when the user joins the meeting using the third party audio

CheckBox.name: chk_16v9_video_mode
CheckBox.text: 16:9(wide screen)

CheckBox.name: chk_original_size
CheckBox.text: Original size

CheckBox.name: chk_HD_video
CheckBox.text: Enable HD video

CheckBox.name: chk_video_mirror_effect
CheckBox.text: Enable mirror effect

CheckBox.name: chk_hardware_encode
CheckBox.text: Enable the hardware acceleration

CheckBox.name: chk_face_beauty_effect
CheckBox.text: Enable the video facial beauty effect

CheckBox.name: chk_always_show_name_on_video
CheckBox.text: Enable to show the username on the video.

CheckBox.name: chk_auto_turn_off_video_when_join
CheckBox.text: Enable to turn off my video when joining meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_hide_no_video_users_on_wall_view
CheckBox.text: Enable to hide the non-video participants.

CheckBox.name: chk_spotlight_self
CheckBox.text: Enable to spotlight the video

CheckBox.name: chk_49videoes_in_gallary_view
CheckBox.text: Enable to show the participants in Gallery View up to 49 per screen.
CheckBox.tooltip: The CPU on your current device only supports displaying the video window of 25 attendees on the gallery mode order screen.For more information on how to use this feature, see the article 《show attendees video in gallery mode》

CheckBox.name: chk_have_green_background
CheckBox.text: I have real green backgound.
CheckBox.tooltip: Using the real green background can improve the proformance of virtual background

CheckBox.name: chk_select_record_file_location_after_meeting
CheckBox.text: Enable to select record file location after meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_multi_audio_stream_record
CheckBox.text: Enable multi-audio record

CheckBox.name: chk_optimize_for_3rd_party_video_editor
CheckBox.text: Enable optimize for 3rd party video editor

CheckBox.name: chk_add_timestamp_watermark
CheckBox.text: Enable to add timestamp watermark

CheckBox.name: chk_show_video_thumbnail_when_share
CheckBox.text: Enable to show video thumbnail when share

CheckBox.name: chk_place_video_next_to_share_in_record
CheckBox.text: Enable to place video next to share in record

CheckBox.name: chk_bottom_toolbar
CheckBox.text: Hide the toolbar at the bottom of the meeting window

CheckBox.name: chk_tool-tip
CheckBox.text: Show tool-tip in the meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_always_display_task-bar_icon
CheckBox.text: Always display the icon on the task-bar

CheckBox.name: chk_leave_meeting_button
CheckBox.text: Display the 'LEAVE MEETING' button on the pop-up dialogue box when the host leaves the meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_chat_button_and_menu_item
CheckBox.text: Hide the 'CHAT' button and menu item

CheckBox.name: chk_record_button_and_menu_item
CheckBox.text: Hide the 'RECORD' button and menu item

CheckBox.name: chk_invite_button
CheckBox.text: Display the 'INVITE' button

CheckBox.name: chk_enter_or_exit_the_full_screen_buttons
CheckBox.text: Display the buttons to enter or exit the full screen in the meeting window

CheckBox.name: chk_recation_button
CheckBox.text: Hide the 'Reaction' button

CheckBox.name: chk_meetinginfo_button
CheckBox.text: Hide the 'Meeting Info' button

CheckBox.name: chk_sharing_toolbar
CheckBox.text: Display the sharing toolbar(before sharing)

CheckBox.name: chk_floating_sharing_toolbar
CheckBox.text: Display the floating sharing toolbar(in sharing)

CheckBox.name: chk_floating_video_window
CheckBox.text: Display the floating video window when sharing in the meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_ios_device_introduction_window
CheckBox.text: Display the introduction window when sharing on the IOS device

CheckBox.name: chk_share_computer_sound_check-box
CheckBox.text: Display the 'SHARE COMPUTER SOUND' check-box in the sharing window

CheckBox.name: chk_optimize_for_full_screen_video_clip_check-box
CheckBox.text: Display the 'OPTIMIZE FOR FULL SCREEN VIDEO CLIP' check-box in the sharing window

CheckBox.name: chk_switch_to_single_participant_share_dialog_box
CheckBox.text: Show the 'SWITCH TO SINGLE PARTICIPANT SHARE' dialog box when multiple participants are sharing and the user try to change the setting to single share

CheckBox.name: chk_green_frame_when_sharing
CheckBox.text: Display the green frame when sharing the application

CheckBox.name: chk_approve_remote_control_dlg
CheckBox.text: Display the dialog box when receiving the request of remote control during the meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_decline_remote_control_response_dlg
CheckBox.text: Display the dialog box when the request of the remote control is refused

CheckBox.name: chk_meeting_wrong_password_dialog
CheckBox.text: Hide the dialog box if the password is wrong when join the meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_waiting_for_host_dialog
CheckBox.text: Hide the dialog box of waiting for the host after joining the meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_input_meeting_password_dialog
CheckBox.text: Display the dialog box to input password

CheckBox.name: chk_input_meeting_screen_name_dialog
CheckBox.text: Display the dialog box to input the screen name which is to be displayed in the meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_select_join_audio_dialog
CheckBox.text: Hide the dialog 'SELECT JOIN AUDIO' when joining meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_phone_call_tab
CheckBox.text: Display 'PHONE CALL' tab in the audio dialog box when joining the meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_call_me_tab
CheckBox.text: Display 'CALL ME' tab in the audio dialog box when joining the meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_invite_by_email_tab
CheckBox.text: Show 'Invite by Email' tab page in the invite dialog box when the dialog is shown

CheckBox.name: chk_invite_by_phone_tab
CheckBox.text: Show 'Invite by Phone' tab page in the invite dialog box when the dialog is shown

CheckBox.name: chk_invite_a_room_system_tab
CheckBox.text: Show 'Invite a Room System' tab page in the invite dialog box when the dialog is shown

CheckBox.name: chk_dial_in_sub-tab
CheckBox.text: Show 'Dial In' sub-tab page

CheckBox.name: chk_call_out_sub-tab
CheckBox.text: Show 'Call Out' sub-tab page

CheckBox.name: chk_upgrade_free_meeting_button
CheckBox.text: Hide the button 'UPGRADE' when prompt the tooltip of free meeting counts down

CheckBox.name: chk_remaining_meeting_time_button
CheckBox.text: Hide the 'REMAINING MEETING TIME' button in the meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_setting_dialog_topmost_attribute
CheckBox.text: Remove the topmost attribute of setting dialog

CheckBox.name: chk_full_phone_number_for_phone_user
CheckBox.text: Hide the full phone number for the user who joins the meeting with phone

CheckBox.name: chk_double-click_switch_full_screen_mode
CheckBox.text: Enable to switch between the full screen mode and normal mode by double-click

Label.name: text_back_to_meeting
Label.text: Active the principal window of meeting and place it on top:

Label.name: text_set_meeting_ID
Label.text: Set the meeting ID in the title-bar of the meeting window:

Label.name: text_meeting_window_position
Label.text: Set the position of the primary view meeting window:

Label.text: Set the left coordinate of the window:

Label.name: text_window_top
Label.text: Set the top coordinate of the window:

Label.name: text_sharing_floating_video_window_position
Label.text: Set the position of the floating video window when sharing:

Label.name: text_sharing_window_left
Label.text: Set the left coordinate of the window:

Label.name: text_sharing_window_top
Label.text: Set the top coordinate of the window:

Label.name: text_floating_video_window_left
Label.text: Set the left coordinate of the window:

Label.name: text_floating_video_window_top
Label.text: Set the top coordinate of the window:

CheckBox.name: chk_grab_share_without_prompt
CheckBox.text: Close the current sharing content without prompt and directly begin a new sharing content

CheckBox.name: chk_share_IOS_device
CheckBox.text: Enable to share IOS device

CheckBox.name: chk_share_white_board
CheckBox.text: Enable to share white board

CheckBox.name: chk_multi_share
CheckBox.text: Forbid multi-share

CheckBox.name: chk_remote_control_copy_and_paste
CheckBox.text: Disable to copy and paste for remote control

CheckBox.name: chk_auto_adjust_speaker_volume
CheckBox.text: Enable to auto-adjust the volume of the speaker when joining the meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_auto_adjust_mic_volume
CheckBox.text: Enable to auto-adjust the volume of the mic when joining the meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_force_to_enable_video_when_join
CheckBox.text: Force to enable the video when join meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_force_to_turn_off_video_when_join
CheckBox.text: Force to turn off video when joining the meeting

Label.name: text_current_speaker_mode
Label.text: Switch to the mode of showing the current speaker:

Label.name: text_current_speaker_mode
Label.text: Show the video users on previous page or next page in video wall mode:

CheckBox.name: chk_participants_list
CheckBox.text: Display the window which is used to display the list of the participants

CheckBox.name: chk_chat_dialog
CheckBox.text: Show the chat dialog during the meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_claim_host
CheckBox.text: Enable to claim host

CheckBox.name: chk_split_screen_ability
CheckBox.text: Enable to split screen during the meeting

CheckBox.name: chk_switch_split_screen
CheckBox.text: Switch to the split screen mode or cancel

Label.name: text_full_screen_display_mode
Label.text: Enter or Exit full screen display mode:

CheckBox.name: chk_enter_full_screen_for_first_view
CheckBox.text: Enable the full screen mode for the first view

CheckBox.name: chk_enter_full_screen_for_second_view
CheckBox.text: Enable the full screen mode for the second view if it is in the dual view mode

CheckBox.name: chk_exit_full_screen_for_first_view
CheckBox.text: Exit the full screen mode for the first view

CheckBox.name: chk_exit_full_screen_for_second_view
CheckBox.text: Exit the full screen mode for the second view if it is in the dual view mode

CheckBox.name: chk_auto_end_other_meeting_when_start_meeting
CheckBox.text: End automatically another ongoing meeting when joining a new meeting

Label.name: text_pre_set_information
Label.text: Pre-set email and username information before joining the webinar:
